name: OperationTailSpin - teamFiggleBottom
description:
TailSpin is a small Bullet hell game designed by team FiggleBottom of the game design club. You play as a small plane fighting as a one man army against a never ending horde of airplanes. Bosses periodically enter the airspace as waves of enemies go by. How long can you survive this war?

Developed by Shawn F, Joshua L, and Andy C.
